replies.body:
{{champion:67}} Well I think it's time to head home. 

{{champion:103}} Yeah I need my beauty sleep. 

{{champion:102}} _yawn_ Sleep sounds good. 

{{champion:113}} fjwoahwigkw

{{champion:103}} What? 

{{champion:22}} Looks like the poison really effecting her now. 

{{champion:67}} Will she be ok? 

{{champion:22}} Oh yeah. A good night sleep or 2 and she will be fine, right Sejuani? 

{{champion:113}} ZZZZZZZzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzz

{{champion:34}} ZZZZZZZZZZzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzzZZZZZZZZZZZZZZZz

{{champion:222}} Not carrying them. 

{{champion:22}} Don't need to. Hold on 1 moment. 

_Crack_

{{champion:67}} DID YOU JUST BREAK ANIVIA's NECK!!!!?

{{champion:22}} 1 second. 

{{champion:34}} _poof_

{{champion:103}} An egg? 

{{champion:22}} And now...we wait. 

{{champion:34}} ..................._poof_

{{champion:222}} Cool she back.

{{champion:34}} DID YOU JUST BREAK MY NECK!!!!!?

{{champion:22}} Yeah. 

{{champion:34}} WHY!!!!?

{{champion:22}} We needed to get home. 

{{champion:34}} So you kill me?

{{champion:22}} Well I couldn't wait for you to wake up and I didn't want you to fly drunk.  Now you are awake and sober. 

{{champion:34}} Couldn't of there been an easier way? 

{{champion:222}} I have a couple of grenades I could of used. 

{{champion:34}} .............................

{{champion:222}} :D

{{champion:34}} Let's go home. 

_Later_

{{champion:23}} Welcome home. Had a nice time? 

{{champion:22}} Yep. 

{{champion:23}} Good to hear. By the way, a message came for you. 

{{champion:22}} Urgent?

{{champion:23}} Not really. 

{{champion:22}} Good. I'll take care of it in the morning. Right now, the bed is calling to me. 

{{champion:23}} Night. 

_door closes._

{{champion:23}} .........ok she is gone. 

{{champion:201}} That was close. 

{{champion:2}} Yeah...remember what happen the last time she found us partying here in her house. 

{{champion:77}} Still have some cuts from that one. 

{{champion:106}} Guess it a night for us then too huh? 

{{champion:22}} You better believe your night is over

{{champion:201}} {{champion:2}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:106}} !!!!!

{{champion:23}} Oh....crap....



**_The End._**

{{champion:201}} Why does she hurt so much??

{{champion:2}} She wasn't this strong when you married her

{{champion:23}} Ever since her rework she's been really strong...

Hey, quick question: How does Sejuani get home then???

Anyway, AWESOME STORY!  What's next?!?  Too excited to wait ... can you give us a teaser?  Thanks for the stories!

Ashe and Anivia dropped her off........while flying over her house. 


But don't worry.....her Boar broke her fall.
Lmao broke her fall! They chucked her ass off the bird didn't they?
Yep.
Ok, thanks.  Was just curious about that.  Anyway, thanks again for the stories!
XD what happens when Shyvana gets home?

{{champion:102}} Honey I'm home-Why is everything on fire?

{{champion:59}} **THEY'RE TEETHING!!!!!!**
XD thanks. you are the best.

Back at Piltover:
{{champion:254}} I see Jinx coming, Lets get her!
{{champion:51}} Right
{{champion:254}} *Charges in*
{{champion:222}} *Stops Vi* Not now Fat Hands, I'm tired after what happened tonight *Keeps walking*
{{champion:254}} {{champion:51}} uhhh...???
Yep.  That feeling when your nemesis, who is well known for destroying your city, walks right by without causing a single problem.  I almost feel bad for them.
Killing Anivia to get her sober... only Ashe could justify that logic
When I read that, I was like, "Oh, yeah ... that passive," so I didn't freak out at Ashe suddenly murdering Anivia.  But I bet someone did ...
Simply imagining Jinx making that face was the best part of the entire story.
http://orig12.deviantart.net/2de4/f/2013/281/e/7/league_of_legends_music__get_jinxed_5_by_xxxaimanexxx-d6prqpl.jpg
That, was a good story, you should somehow get Riot's attention so you could write short stories for each of the champion's. I'll help too if you want.
I am happy that you enjoyed it.

As usual great story. Sorry I should upvote more of your stories but I'm not usually logged in. It's probably the same for others too, so know you have a larger following than the upvotes would suggest
That ending tho xD
Came up with it like....4 minutes before the sale page came up.
Painful
Lol that ending.

Another marvelous story. I look fowards to the next one.
http://img.pandawhale.com/147652-thor-this-post-I-like-it-anoth-SNki.gif
http://www.belloflostsouls.net/wp-content/uploads/2015/03/post-11756-I-understood-that-reference-gi-GkxF.gif
Only comment for the first 20 minutes. Best comment for the next 20,000.

**The Flaw in the Code Part 1**
Come one, come all. Summoners please hear
The truth about Riot is finally clear
But first to understand, realize, comprehend
I must say the beginning, the middle, then end

Once in a room, in a far away place
Was a group of five people, all smarter than {{champion:126}} 
They worked and they toiled and created a game
Thanks to them, League of Legends would soon earn its fame

And for years, for Riot and its players? No trouble
But something was happening that left all befuddled
Bugs and glitches from nowhere. Absurd!
But from in their computers, laughter was heard...

I can't continue my story right now and right here
Because of the enemy and their prying ears
But if you stay faithful, justice prevails
My friend, I will see you next Summoner's Sale.

Outside of Ashe and tryndamere's house

{{champion:103}} You hear that?
{{champion:67}} Would not want to be in there,
{{champion:34}} Rather have my neck snaped again...

{{champion:77}} RUUNNNNN
{{champion:106}} IT HURTS 
{{champion:201}}  MY EYES, HOW IS SHE SO STRONG?
{{champion:2}}  BROOOO, Chill out 

{{champion:22}}  WHAT YOU SAYIN?!??!!?? (ULT)

{{champion:2}} NOTHING MA'AM, i will be going now, have a good night (ULT){{summoner:6}} {{summoner:4}} {{item:3284}} 

{{champion:23}} Why you got to be so mean Ashe? 

{{champion:22}} WHAT YOU SAY??!!!?????
{{champion:23}} Dam... (ULT)

Blitz's Golden Heart (Written by myself)

Chapter 1: A Shocking Development 

*The champions of piltover are resting and relaxing in a quiet "tavern" after a long hard week on the rift*

*Orianna and Blitzcrank are sitting together at a booth across from Vi and Caitlyn*

{{champion:53}} This week's outcome has been....Profitable, to say the least.

{{champion:61}} I agree, and because the Pool Party event, we all received a little extra attention.

{{champion:254}} Yeah, I'm just glad the League gave us this downtime. What are you gonna do with your vacation cupcake? *reaches over and slides a hand around Caitlyn's waist*

{{champion:51}} *Slightly shocked* I....uh...was planning on doing some off the books investigative work...

{{champion:254}} Oh come on cupcake... *looks pleadingly into Caitlyn's eyes* You can't spend all your time on work. How about you and me head out tomorrow. Just you and me.

{{champion:51}} *Looks unsure* I don't know Vi, I've got a lot of....

*Explosion*

*The entire wall opposite the group exploded inward, leaving a cloud dust in its wake*

{{champion:254}} What in world?!?!?!

*Before she could say another word, a boomerang like object flew out and hit her square in the chest latching onto her, and it proceeded to pump into Vi's body hundreds of volts of electricity*

{{champion:254}} AHHHHHH!!!!!!

{{champion:51}} Vi!!!!

*An identical boomerang flew out and repeated the process on the sheriff*

{{champion:51}} AHHH!!!!

*Blitzcrank who had shielded Orianna from the initial blast raised himself to face this mysterious attacker*

{{champion:53}} Show yourself!!!

{{champion:112}} HAHAHAHA!!!!

*The maniacal laughter came from the depths of the dust that surrounded the blown out wall, and as the laughter became louder a form began to take shape in the into a figure that Blitzcrank had feared he would never see again*

*The Zaunite Inventor stepped forward out of the cloud (in his new creator garments)*

{{champion:112}} It has been too long my creation....I am so proud to hear of your performance within the league.

{{champion:53}} What do you want from us?

{{champion:112}} Oh? What do I want? Nothing of immediate consequence, only....I wish to examine my creation further.....under a more "controlled" environment.

{{champion:53}} I take it by controlled, you mean enslaved? I am free being and I will never again become your pawn of destruction!

{{champion:112}} Hmmm...I was hoping you would be more inclined to my offer to come back and join me of your own free will, but I see now that this "error" in your programming needs a little more than just   casual persuasion.

*Viktor touches a button on his gauntlet*

{{champion:254}} Seize the fembot! Maybe after you've seen what I could to her you will change your mind!

*At that moment the ground below Orianna exploded, after the dust cleared a BattleCast creation rose forth with Orianna slug over his back*

{{champion:31}} Target acquired. Moving to home destination.

{{champion:53}} NO!!!

*Blitzcrank raised his hand to launch a rocket grab directly at ChoGath*

*Metal Grinding*

{{champion:53}} AHH!!!!

*The saw blade finished cutting Blitzcrank's arm clean off which fell to the ground in a mangled heap*

{{champion:72}} Enemy combatant neutralized. Moving to guard transport.

*Viktor walked up to within a foot of Blitzcrank*

{{champion:112}} You see Blitzcrank, all my creations in time eventually return to me.

*Viktor returned back into the dust, leaving his broken creation behind*

{{champion:53}} Orianna.....

*Power Failing, initiating stasis*
OMG Thank you Riot! I've been waiting so long for Fizz to be on sale, since I never got to play him the last time he was on free week!
he is pretty cheap for a champ saying 4800 is 4800
Yeah, I know, but I've been using most of my IP on trying to get a decent rune page started.

Now gather ye drunkards, that's how these begin,
The songs of our heroes, of wars and our kin.
Well, now the fight's ours,
And none of us cowers,
We'll drink to all hours 'cause we know we can win!

Oh,
They cut into heaven and called it a door,
The Herald will lead us to even the score.
We'll take back the sky, and we'll give them the floor.
We'll take back the sky, and we'll give them the floor!

The beast was upon us, our hopes all but drowned,
At our necks a monster, at our heels a hound.
But we found a fortress,
And it's frigging gorgeous!
So join in the chorus and down a new round!

Oh!
He cut into heaven, we said it before,
Andraste will guide us to even the score!
We'll take back the sky, and we'll give him the flo-----or.
We'll take back the sky, and we'll give him the floor!

We look to our leader, and heft up our crest,
To show this Corypheus we're not impressed!
He thinks we've been mastered,
We'll beat down the bastard,
And then we'll get plastered, we're blest by the best!

O--------h!
He cut into heaven, now sing it once more,
Inquisitor! Lead us to even the score!
We'll take back the sky, and we'll give him the flo----------------------or!
We'll take back the sky!
And feed him his lie!
And black his foul eye!
Let all arrows fly!
And then we'll have pie!
Die DIE die die DIE!
We'll take back the sky, and we'll give him the floor!
